item.title: Steelmakers Shine: Tata, Jindal, SAIL Drive Nifty Metal Outperformance
item.description: Weaker dollar, GST cuts, and expected steel production cuts in China are fueling investor optimism.

item.title: Bullish Signals For Piramal Pharma: SEBI Analyst Flags Technical Breakout, Sees Over 10% Upside By October
item.description: Technical charts and retail sentiment now indicate bullish momentum.

item.title: Why Is TechnipFMC Stock Rising Premarket Today?
item.description: The oilfield services firm is set to replace Skechers USA in the S&P MidCap 400, effective before the opening of trading on Friday.

item.title: Cybersecurity Vendor Zscaler’s Stock Rises Premarket: What’s Fueling The Upside?
item.description: CEO Jay Chaudhry noted that the company’s Zero Trust and artificial intelligence security solutions are driving robust demand.

item.title: Oil Prices Slip Following Gains On Fresh US Sanctions — Focus Shifts To OPEC+ Meet
item.description: Benchmark Brent crude prices fell 0.3% to $68.95 per barrel, while U.S. West Texas Intermediate prices fell 18 cents to $65.40 per barrel at 4.35 a.m....
